name: AI-Powered TradFi Integration
description: Comprehensive evaluation template for AI applications in traditional finance integration with blockchain, focusing on risk assessment, fraud detection, automation, and market analysis
author: Shai Perednik

categories.name: Risk Assessment & Management
categories.description: Evaluation of AI risk assessment models for traditional finance integration

metrics.name: Credit Risk Modeling
metrics.description: Quality of AI credit risk assessment models and integration with blockchain-based validation

thresholds.T0: Basic statistical models with limited integration to on-chain data; accuracy below 85%; no real-time updates
thresholds.T1: Advanced ML models with deep on-chain data integration; accuracy exceeding 90%; real-time risk reassessment capabilities

metrics.name: Fraud Detection Systems
metrics.description: Effectiveness of AI fraud detection models across TradFi and blockchain environments

thresholds.T0: Rule-based detection with basic ML enhancement; 75-85% detection rate; high false positive rate (>10%)
thresholds.T1: Advanced deep learning models with cross-chain monitoring; >95% detection rate; low false positive rate (<5%)

metrics.name: Portfolio Optimization
metrics.description: Sophistication of AI portfolio management tools bridging traditional and digital assets

thresholds.T0: Basic mean-variance optimization; limited consideration of crypto-specific factors; manual rebalancing
thresholds.T1: Advanced multi-factor models with crypto-native risk factors; dynamic rebalancing; cross-asset correlation analysis

categories.name: Process Automation
categories.description: Evaluation of AI automation capabilities for cross-platform financial processes

metrics.name: KYC/AML Automation
metrics.description: Level of automation in KYC/AML processes spanning traditional and blockchain domains

thresholds.T0: Semi-automated KYC with manual verification steps; basic blockchain address screening; 24-48 hour processing
thresholds.T1: Fully automated KYC with biometric verification; advanced blockchain analytics integration; <1 hour processing

metrics.name: Document & Contract Processing
metrics.description: Quality of AI document processing and smart contract integration

thresholds.T0: Basic document OCR with template matching; limited smart contract parameter extraction; manual verification needed
thresholds.T1: Advanced NLP with semantic understanding; automated translation to smart contract parameters; minimal human oversight

metrics.name: Regulatory Reporting
metrics.description: Comprehensiveness of automated regulatory reporting across traditional and blockchain operations

thresholds.T0: Basic report generation with manual oversight; limited blockchain transaction reporting; monthly update cycles
thresholds.T1: Fully automated multi-jurisdiction reporting; comprehensive on-chain transaction analysis; real-time compliance monitoring

categories.name: Market Analysis & Prediction
categories.description: Evaluation of AI market analysis capabilities across traditional and crypto markets

metrics.name: Cross-Market Correlation Analysis
metrics.description: Sophistication of AI models tracking correlations between traditional and crypto markets

thresholds.T0: Basic linear correlation models; limited dataset; delayed analysis (daily/weekly); no regime change detection
thresholds.T1: Advanced non-linear models with machine learning; comprehensive multi-asset coverage; real-time analysis; regime change alerts

metrics.name: Multi-Source Sentiment Analysis
metrics.description: Quality of sentiment analysis from both traditional financial news and crypto-specific sources

thresholds.T0: Basic keyword-based sentiment scoring; limited sources (<10); no cross-validation; daily updates
thresholds.T1: Advanced contextual NLP with entity recognition; diverse sources (50+); cross-validation mechanisms; real-time updates

metrics.name: Cross-Platform Arbitrage Identification
metrics.description: Ability to identify and execute arbitrage opportunities between traditional and crypto markets

thresholds.T0: Basic price comparison across major platforms; >1 second latency; limited to major assets; no execution capabilities
thresholds.T1: Advanced arbitrage modeling across diverse platforms; <100ms latency; coverage of long-tail assets; automated execution
